content: In this phase, you'll need to avoid the pools of blood. There are also some projectiles, where little orbs of blood will float up in the air and then hone in on you. Thankfully, you'll have a little bit of help with this one, as Zhu Bajie will appear in the second phase to give you a hand.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Foothills_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Foothills Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Deer Sight Forest' and the sub-subsection 'Yaoguai Chief - Cloudtreading Deer'.
The content is as follows:
In this phase, you'll need to avoid the pools of blood. There are also some projectiles, where little orbs of blood will float up in the air and then hone in on you. Thankfully, you'll have a little bit of help with this one, as Zhu Bajie will appear in the second phase to give you a hand.
